attributes.action: stop rushing reforms to SEN reform get it right not rushed
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Mrs Teather
We know you mean well and our really trying to help
children with SEN and want to make postive changes to their lives ,but this is something that cannot be rushed to get it right .
Let's make a positive change and one that is right so we don't end with up with the same problems again
Please take a look at www.specialneedsjungle .com where there is a open letter to you talking about what's going on in your pathfinder's groups
Best wishes
Olivia Anderton

rejection.details: Correspondence on personal issues cannot be accepted on to the e-petitions website
